subject: Re: [junit] Execution Time
msgSnippet: ... When you run your tests with Ant you get this information in the test report. ... There are a number of options. Search the web! -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
timytkuo wrote:

> Is it possible for me to get the execution time for each test case
> instead of the total time?

When you run your tests with Ant you get this information in the test
report.

> I'm using JUnit for automate testing, not for Unit testing. Does
> anyone know if there is any other software to use for auto testing?

There are a number of options. Search the web!
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
